title: Sunday Comics: Finished A Book Today...
text:
Hello! It’s time for Kotaku’s Sunday Comics, your weekly roundup of the best webcomics. The images enlarge if you click on the magnifying glass icon.

(No new comic this week.)

Awkward Zombie by Katie Tiedrich. Originally published July 30. Read more of Awkward Zombie.

Corpse Run by Alex Di Stasi. Published September 7. Read more of Corpse Run.

Clueless Hero by Luis Lee and Ana Gaby Perez. Published September 2. Read more of Clueless Hero.

Double XP by M.S. Corley and Josh Crandall. Published September 6. Read more of Double XP.

Life in Aggro by Fei Hsiao and Cecilia Vasquez. Published September 8. Read more of Life in Aggro.

Nerf NOW!! by Josué Pereira. Published September 8. Read more of Nerf NOW!!

Penny Arcade by Jerry Holkins and Mike Krahulik. Published September 6. Read more of Penny Arcade.
description: Hello! It’s time for Kotaku’s Sunday Comics, your weekly roundup of the best webcomics. The images enlarge if you click on the magnifying glass icon.
